verses.verse: And it shall come to pass <S%H1697><s%>, when all these things are come <S%H935><s%> upon you <S%H1293><s%>, the blessing and the curse <S%H7045><s%>, which I have set <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H7725><s%>, and you shall call them to mind <S%H3824><s%> among all the nations <S%H1471><s%>, where the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has driven you <S%H5080><s%>,

And shall return <S%H7725><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, and shall obey <S%H8085><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%> according to all that I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%>, you and your sons <S%H1121><s%>, with all your heart <S%H3824><s%>, and with all your soul <S%H5315><s%>;

That then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will turn <S%H7725><s%> your captivity <S%H7622><s%>, and have compassion <S%H7355><s%> upon you <S%H7725><s%>, and will return and gather <S%H6908><s%> you from all the nations <S%H5971><s%>, where the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has scattered you <S%H6327><s%>.

If any of your be driven out <S%H5080><s%> unto the uttermost <S%H7097><s%> parts of heaven <S%H8064><s%>, from there will the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gather <S%H6908><s%> you <S%H3947><s%>, and from there will he fetch you:

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will bring <S%H935><s%> you into the land <S%H776><s%> which your fathers <S%H1><s%> possessed <S%H3423><s%>, and you shall possess <S%H3423><s%> it <S%H3190><s%>; and he will do you good, and multiply <S%H7235><s%> you above your fathers <S%H1><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will circumcise <S%H4135><s%> your heart <S%H3824><s%>, and the heart <S%H3824><s%> of your seed <S%H2233><s%>, to love <S%H157><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> with all your heart <S%H3824><s%>, and with all your soul <S%H5315><s%>, that you may live <S%H2416><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will put <S%H5414><s%> all these curses <S%H423><s%> upon your enemies <S%H341><s%>, and on them that hate <S%H8130><s%> you <S%H7291><s%>, which persecuted you.

And you shall return <S%H7725><s%> and obey <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> all his commandments <S%H4687><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will make you plentiful <S%H3498><s%> in every work <S%H4639><s%> of your hand <S%H3027><s%>, in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your body <S%H990><s%>, and in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your cattle <S%H929><s%>, and in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your land <S%H127><s%>, for good <S%H2896><s%>: for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will again <S%H7725><s%> rejoice <S%H7797><s%> over you for good <S%H2896><s%>, as he rejoiced <S%H7797><s%> over your fathers <S%H1><s%>:

If you shall listen <S%H8085><s%> unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, to keep <S%H8104><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%> and his statutes <S%H2708><s%> which are written <S%H3789><s%> in this book <S%H5612><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%>, and if you turn <S%H7725><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> with all your heart <S%H3824><s%>, and with all your soul <S%H5315><s%>.
For this commandment <S%H4687><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%>, it is not hidden <S%H6381><s%> from you <S%H7350><s%>, neither is it far off.

It is not in heaven <S%H8064><s%>, that you should say <S%H559><s%>, Who shall go up <S%H5927><s%> for us to heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and bring <S%H3947><s%> it unto us <S%H8085><s%>, that we may hear it <S%H6213><s%>, and do it?

Neither is it beyond <S%H5676><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%>, that you should say <S%H559><s%>, Who shall go <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5676><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> for us <S%H3947><s%>, and bring it unto us <S%H8085><s%>, that we may hear it <S%H6213><s%>, and do it?
But the word <S%H1697><s%> is very <S%H3966><s%> near <S%H7138><s%> unto you <S%H6310><s%>, in your mouth, and in your heart <S%H3824><s%>, that you may do it <S%H6213><s%>.
See <S%H7200><s%>, I have set <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%> life <S%H2416><s%> and good <S%H2896><s%>, and death <S%H4194><s%> and evil <S%H7451><s%>;

In that I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%> to love <S%H157><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, to walk <S%H3212><s%> in his ways <S%H1870><s%>, and to keep <S%H8104><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%> and his statutes <S%H2708><s%> and his judgments <S%H4941><s%>, that you may live <S%H2421><s%> and multiply <S%H7235><s%>: and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall bless <S%H1288><s%> you in the land <S%H776><s%> where you go <S%H935><s%> to possess it <S%H3423><s%>.

But if your heart <S%H3824><s%> turn away <S%H6437><s%>, so that you will not hear <S%H8085><s%>, but shall be drawn away <S%H5080><s%>, and worship <S%H7812><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>, and serve them <S%H5647><s%>;

I denounce <S%H5046><s%> unto you this day <S%H3117><s%>, that you shall surely <S%H6><s%> perish <S%H6><s%>, and that you shall not prolong <S%H748><s%> your days <S%H3117><s%> upon the land <S%H127><s%>, where you pass over <S%H5674><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> to go <S%H935><s%> to possess it <S%H3423><s%>.

I call <S%H5749><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth <S%H776><s%> to record <S%H5749><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> against you <S%H5414><s%>, that I have set before <S%H6440><s%> you life <S%H2416><s%> and death <S%H4194><s%>, blessing <S%H1293><s%> and cursing <S%H7045><s%>: therefore choose <S%H977><s%> life <S%H2416><s%>, that both you and your seed <S%H2233><s%> may live <S%H2421><s%>:

That you may love <S%H157><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, and that you may obey <S%H8085><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%>, and that you may cleave <S%H1692><s%> unto him <S%H2416><s%>: for he is your life, and the length <S%H753><s%> of your days <S%H3117><s%>: that you may live <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H127><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> unto your fathers <S%H1><s%>, to Abraham <S%H85><s%>, to Isaac <S%H3327><s%>, and to Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, to give them <S%H5414><s%>.
